p.span: - Increase your productivity, customize your experience, and engage in information you care about.

div.class: inner col col24 first last id39852e41-daa0-4a37-af9e-a74cfb7725e3

div.div: Alert Center Alert Center allows you to view all alerts and emergencies in your area. If there are alerts or emergencies, they will be listed below by category. To be instantly notified of alerts and emergencies subscribe to Notify Me or RSS.
There are currently no alerts for this category.

div.p:
Effective Immediately
Town Staff will always be available to assist our residents but during this time of a Declared State of Emergency by the Governor and the Town, our method of service needs to change to protect our residents, employees and their families during the COVID-19 pandemic.
You will continue to receive quality professional services from your Town staff but it will be delivered in a different manner. Please do not come to Town Hall as there will be no “in person” services without an appointment.
Please conduct all transactions via the Town’s website www.narragansettri.gov, use the payment drop box, or call the respective Town department via telephone for assistance. If it is determined that a face to face meeting is necessary, you will be required to make an appointment, no exceptions.
Main Number: 401-789-1044

div.div: There are currently no alerts for this category.
There are currently no alerts for this category.
